```{r}
library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)
signal<-read.csv("../etc/Cartoon-02.wav.csv",header=FALSE,sep=",")
names(signal)<-c("x","y")
ggplot(signal,aes(x=x,y=y))+geom_point()
```


## Spectrum

```{r}
signalfft<-read.csv("../etc/Cartoon-02.wav.csv.csv",header=FALSE,sep=",")
names(signalfft)<-c("freq","rex","imx","mod","arg")
dominant<-signalfft %>% slice_head(n=256)
barplot(dominant$mod,col="steelblue",names.arg=dominant$freq,xlab="Frequency")
```
